rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control that’s a copy or a token deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then draw a card.
Whenever you copy your first spell each turn, bifurcate up to one target creature you control. [i](If it isn’t a token, sacrifice it. If you do, create two tapped tokens that are copies of it except each is a Mutant.)[/i]
